def_cn: (生活)放纵的，狂欢的，不羁的
def_en: If you say that someone has a riotous lifestyle, you mean that they frequently behave in a excessive and uncontrolled way, for example by eating or drinking too much.

def_cn: (行为或事件)狂欢的，喧闹的，放纵的
def_en: You can describe someone's behaviour or an event as riotous when it is noisy and lively in a rather wild way.

def_cn: 色彩丰富的;五颜六色的;装饰华丽的
def_en: You can describe things as riotous when they are very colourful or decorative rather than plain or simple.
